postal_code_type = <!-- [[Postal Index Number|PIN]] --> | postal_code = | registration_plate = | website = | footnotes = }} ''' Vittal ''' is a [[village]] in the southern state of [[Karnataka]], India.<ref name="censusindia">Village code= 2706200 {{cite web|url=http://www.censusindia.gov.in/Census_Data_2001/Village_Directory/Population_data/Population_5000_and_Above.aspx|title=Census of India : Villages with population 5000 & above|first=Registrar General & Census Commissioner, India|accessdate=2008-12-18}}</ref><ref name="yahoomaps">{{cite web|url=http://in.maps.yahoo.com|title=Yahoomaps India :|accessdate=2008-12-18}} Vittal, Dakshina Kannada, Karnataka</ref> It is located in the [[Bantwal]] [[taluk]] of [[Dakshina Kannada district]] in Karnataka. ==Demographics== {{As of|2001}} India [[census]], Vittal had a population of 15650 with 7882 males and 7768 females.<ref name="censusindia" /> Vittal has already grown in to a town. There is a separate KSRTC bus stand and private bus stand. Vittal is directly connected through bus to Manglore, Puttur, Kasargod, Manjeshwar, Uppala, Hosangady, Salettur, B C Road, Kalladka, Kabaka, Kanyana, Perla, Badiadka, panaje, odiyoor, anekal, mudipu, thokkotu, derlakatte, boluvar and many other small places. It is the biggest town in bantwal district, next to kalladka. The famous institutions of Sri Satya Sai Baba such as SSSLSVK, PU college and Balakuteera are located in Alike, around 7 km from Vittal. There is a KSRTC Rajahamsa bus from Alike to Banglore via Vittal. ==See also== * [[Dakshina Kannada]] * [[Districts of Karnataka]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * http://dk.nic.in/ {{Settlements in Dakshina Kannada district}} [[Category:Villages in Dakshina Kannada district]] {{Dakshina Kannada-geo-stub}}
